mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_BOARD_TB( MEMBER_NO, GROUP_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATED_DATE) VALUES( #{author}, 1, #{title}, #{contents}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT GB.BOARD_NO, GB.TITLE, GB.CONTENTS, MEM.MEMBER_NAME, MEM.MEMBER_NO FROM GROUP_BOARD_TB GB, MEMBER_TB MEM WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND MEM.MEMBER_NO = GB.MEMBER_NO

SELECT AA.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_BOARD_TB) AS TOTALCOUNT, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM, GB.BOARD_NO, GB.TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(GB.CREATED_DATE,"%Y년 %c월 %e일") AS CREATED_DATE, MEM.MEMBER_NAME FROM GROUP_BOARD_TB GB, MEMBER_TB MEM, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) A WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND MEM.MEMBER_NO = GB.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY BOARD_NO )AA LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage};

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM, GB.BOARD_NO, GB.TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(GB.CREATED_DATE,"%Y년 %c월 %e일") AS CREATED_DATE, MEM.MEMBER_NAME FROM GROUP_BOARD_TB GB, MEMBER_TB MEM, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) A WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND MEM.MEMBER_NO = GB.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 1, 3
